83130.summary: Some customers in the Minto area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83130.title: Sept 18 - Winnipeg (Minto) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

83152.summary: Some customers in the River Park South area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83152.title: Sept 18 - Winnipeg (River Park South) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
